net.sourceforge.jasa.report
Class DirectRevelationReport

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jasa.report.AbstractAuctionReport
      net.sourceforge.jasa.report.AbstractMarketStatsReport
          net.sourceforge.jasa.report.DirectRevelationReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.report.Report, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Parameterizable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, AuctionReport
Direct Known Subclasses:
EquilibriumReport, SupplyAndDemandStats
public abstract class DirectRevelationReport
extends AbstractMarketStatsReport
implements net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, java.io.Serializable

This class computes the hypothetical market state when all agents bid at their private valuation, ie when all agents bid truthfully. This can be used, for example, for equilibrium calculations.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
